11.content:

"Hey Jackson! Was about time you show up", Mitchell said.
"Yeah, sorry for that Mitch", answered Percy with an apologizing smile on his lips. "Do you have the potion of which you told me?"
"Of course I do", he said and handed the flask over to Percy. "It's a really strong love potion. Whoever you give it, will do anything for you. And by anything, I mean literally ANYTHING, you know?"
"Great", said Percy. "Got it."
With that he walked back to his cabin, to prepare everything for the party.

info.description:
This is an interactive Percy Jackson/Heroes Of Olympus vore story. It plays after the last book of the HOO series.

Feel free, to add your ideas but please follow a few rules:

1. no gore
2. no scat, pissing or fart
